title: AI ChatBot
description: An interactive AI-powered chatbot built to simulate human-like conversations using JavaScript and a rules-based logic system. Designed as a portfolio project to demonstrate real-time interaction and frontend skills.

title: Disease Prediction By Symptoms
description: A machine learning project that predicts diseases based on user-input symptoms using data preprocessing and classification techniques.

title: Detecting Fake News
description: A Python machine learning project designed to classify news articles as real or fake using natural language processing and classification algorithms.
